WorkItem.Description:
If the OFFSET function refers to a cell on a different worksheet and that cell is empty, the OFFSET function evaluates as if the same cell on the *current* worksheet was referred. So for example OFFSET(SomeOtherSheet!A1:1:1) is evaluated as (A1:1:1) if cell A1 on worksheet SomeOtherSheet is empty.
Â 
This occurs in version 71420 of the source code.
WorkItem.Summary: OFFSET from null value cell fails

Comments.Message:
I think this might be a solution:
in Calculation.php change line 3203 
from: $cellRef = $matches[6].$matches[7];
to:  $cellRef = $matches[1].$matches[6].$matches[7]; //this will take in the spreadsheet name stored in matched[1]
Although I'm not sure if this will brake the code, it solved the issue for me.
